mapper.select: select pay_id ,user_pk ,box_img ,box_name ,pay_date ,refund_date ,price ,p.status from pay_box p join member using(user_pk) join box b using(box_code) join box_img bi on bi.box_img_code = b.box_img_code where user_pk = #{id} order by pay_id desc
select count(*) from pay_box p join member using(user_pk) join box b using(box_code) join box_img bi on bi.box_img_code = b.box_img_code where user_pk = #{id}

select pay_id ,box_img ,box_name ,refund_date ,price ,p.status from pay_box p join member using(user_pk) join box b using(box_code) join box_img bi on bi.box_img_code = b.box_img_code where user_pk = #{id} and p.status = 'REFUND' order by pay_id desc

select order_id , d.address , start_delivery_date , delivery_status , product_name , product_img , product_price , p.user_pk , m.user_name from product p join product_detail using(product_sn) join delivery d using(product_id) join member m on m.user_pk = p.user_pk where p.user_pk = #{id} order by order_id desc
select count(*) from product p join product_detail using(product_sn) join delivery d using(product_id) join member m on m.user_pk = p.user_pk where p.user_pk = #{id}
